user_input:
Modify the TJ Sectoral Model. 
Add Nuclear SMR Generators in Germany DE01, DE03, and AT01. Create all of the template properties. Use a max capacity of 1000 MW.
author: DAG-Builder
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operations on the TJ Sectoral Model using the PLEXOS CRUD pipeline: create the specified Generator objects, create their template properties, then set Max Capacity to 1000 MW.

tasks.description: Create a Generator object named 'Nuclear SMR DE01' in region DE01 within the TJ Sectoral Model.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', operate in Model 'TJ Sectoral Model'; Object Class 'Generator'; Region 'DE01'; Object Name 'Nuclear SMR DE01'.

tasks.description: Create a Generator object named 'Nuclear SMR DE03' in region DE03 within the TJ Sectoral Model.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', operate in Model 'TJ Sectoral Model'; Object Class 'Generator'; Region 'DE03'; Object Name 'Nuclear SMR DE03'.

tasks.description: Create a Generator object named 'Nuclear SMR AT01' in region AT01 within the TJ Sectoral Model.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', operate in Model 'TJ Sectoral Model'; Object Class 'Generator'; Region 'AT01'; Object Name 'Nuclear SMR AT01'.

tasks.description: Create all template properties for the Generator 'Nuclear SMR DE01'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select and apply the default Generator template properties to object 'Nuclear SMR DE01' in Model 'TJ Sectoral Model'.

tasks.description: Create all template properties for the Generator 'Nuclear SMR DE03'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select and apply the default Generator template properties to object 'Nuclear SMR DE03' in Model 'TJ Sectoral Model'.

tasks.description: Create all template properties for the Generator 'Nuclear SMR AT01'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select and apply the default Generator template properties to object 'Nuclear SMR AT01' in Model 'TJ Sectoral Model'.

tasks.description: Set the 'Max Capacity' property to 1000 MW for the Generator 'Nuclear SMR DE01'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', update property 'Max Capacity' for object 'Nuclear SMR DE01' in Model 'TJ Sectoral Model' to value 1000 MW.

tasks.description: Set the 'Max Capacity' property to 1000 MW for the Generator 'Nuclear SMR DE03'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', update property 'Max Capacity' for object 'Nuclear SMR DE03' in Model 'TJ Sectoral Model' to value 1000 MW.

tasks.description: Set the 'Max Capacity' property to 1000 MW for the Generator 'Nuclear SMR AT01'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', update property 'Max Capacity' for object 'Nuclear SMR AT01' in Model 'TJ Sectoral Model' to value 1000 MW.
